meta.title: Schedulaa Platform Features | Scheduling, Payroll, and Online Sales Unified
meta.description: Schedulaa unifies scheduling, payroll, hiring, website building, and eCommerce for teams. Sell services or products, automate payments, and manage multi-branch operations in one platform.
meta.ogDescription: Book clients, sell products, pay your team – all from one platform.

hero.subtitle: Schedulaa brings scheduling, payroll, websites, and eCommerce into one experience so your staff and clients stay connected.

banner.title: New:
banner.body: Custom domains with TXT/CNAME verification and automatic SSL are now live.

featureCard.title: A single source of truth for operations
featureCard.subtitle: Replace 5+ disconnected tools with booking, payroll, and websites that already know each other.

scheduling.title: Smarter Scheduling & Booking
scheduling.description: Live department-based service lists, recurring templates, and branded booking modals embedded anywhere.
points: Clients can book multiple services, add-ons, or providers in one flow.
Embed branded booking widgets on partner sites or custom domains.
Shift swaps and leave approvals built into staff scheduling.

payroll.title: Payroll & Compliance
payroll.description: Run region-aware payroll with YTD summaries, tax exports, and self-serve employee portals.
points: Overtime, tips, and holidays calculated automatically.
Integrated with Stripe payouts for fast, secure deposits.
Auto-recalc and audit-ready reports for US + Canada (except QC).

commerce.title: Commerce, Analytics, and Marketing
commerce.description: Sell products and services together, automate campaigns, and measure results in one dashboard.
points: Mixed carts for products and services with add-ons and coupons.
Stripe Checkout with built-in refund and tax automation.
Analytics for revenue, utilization, churn, and top-performing services.
Win-back, VIP, and no-show recovery campaigns included.

featureShowcase.title: Features that work together
featureShowcase.subtitle: Each module is built to hand off context so your staff and clients never lose the thread.

features.title: Unified Booking & Scheduling
description: Real-time client bookings with service selection and self-serve rescheduling.
Employee availability, shift templates, and multi-branch support.
Shift swaps, leave requests, and recurring availability rules.
Automated reminders, digital tips, reviews, and post-visit feedback collection.

features.title: Powerful Payroll & HR
description: Canada + 45 U.S. states supported (EI, CPP, automated stat holiday pay, W-2, T4, ROE).
Pay-rate assignment per employee, overtime tiers, province/state holiday rules, and deductions.
Export payroll journals or plug into remittance APIs for hands-free filing.
Employee onboarding, time tracking, and performance workflows in one place.

features.title: Website Builder & Online Presence
description: Drag-and-drop templates for services, products, hero sections, and contact flows.
Theme customization across fonts, colors, backgrounds, and layout blocks.
Add or remove pages, rearrange navigation, and publish changes instantly.
Connect or purchase a custom domain with SEO-ready structure baked in.

features.title: eCommerce & Product Sales
description: Native product catalog for physical or digital items with rich detail pages.
Secure checkout via Stripe Connect with refunds, partial refunds, and tipping.
Inventory management, pricing controls, and variant options by SKU.
Sales analytics that surface revenue trends, top performers, and sell-through.

features.title: Smart Analytics & Reporting
description: Dashboards for revenue, bookings, retention, and customer lifetime value.
Staff performance reporting with utilization and productivity metrics.
Tax, payout, and settlement reporting with exportable CSV dashboards.
Insights to drive smarter decisions, forecast demand, and spot gaps early.

features.title: Automation & Integrations
description: Zapier integration to connect Schedulaa with QuickBooks, Xero, and more.
Webhooks and REST APIs to trigger workflows or keep external systems in sync.
Scheduler automations for re-engagement campaigns, no-show alerts, and follow-ups.
Embed widgets and booking flows directly into existing sites and partner portals.

features.title: Security, Compliance & Scale
description: Role-based access control for managers, admins, recruiters, and employees.
Secure data storage with encryption, audit logs, and automated backups.
Multi-location, multi-branch support with centralized oversight.
Compliance with regional payroll and privacy regulations out of the box.

features.title: Time Tracking & Break Compliance
description: Clock-in/out tied to scheduled shifts with IP/device hints captured per punch.
Break policies that enforce fixed, windowed, or staggered slots and flag missed breaks.
Force clock-out and bulk apply break templates with full audit trails for payroll.
Exports flow to payroll with unpaid breaks deducted and overtime markers included.

features.title: Payroll-Linked Invoicing
description: Generate client invoices directly from finalized payroll and approved time.
Optional per-employee billing with transparent management fees.
Country-aware tax labels (US Sales Tax, CA GST/HST) and auto totals.
PO numbers, payment terms, and client-ready PDFs included.

features.title: Hiring, Resume Uploads, and Onboarding
description: Create job postings with public application links and track candidate applications.
Secure resume uploads with antivirus scan status (pending, clean, blocked) when enabled.
Request signed documents via secure links and store uploads in the candidate profile.
Convert approved candidates into employees with the candidate record linked for reference.

platformMap.title: Orchestrate every site, team, and location from one map
platformMap.subtitle: Multi-location? Franchise? Recruiting pods? The platform map keeps each branch aligned while honoring local branding and roles.

points.branches: Manage branches, departments, and teams with unique themes and permissions.
points.analytics: Compare performance across branches with live analytics and revenue insights.
points.templates: Each profession template (fitness, real estate, recruiter, teacher, photographer) includes tailored emails and questionnaires.
points.sync: Client booking, shift scheduling, and payroll sync seamlessly under one dashboard.
points.domains: Launch branded sites on your own domain with automatic SSL.

platformMap.mediaAlt: Schedulaa platform map linking scheduling, payroll, automation, websites, and analytics

integrations.title: Integrations and automation made visual
integrations.subtitle: Map your systems, workflows, and automations in one place so marketing, operations, and finance stay aligned.

points.accounting: Sync invoices, payments, and payroll exports directly to QuickBooks or Xero.
points.automation: Automate follow-ups, win-back, and no-show recovery campaigns via email or SMS.
points.stripe: Host secure payments through Stripe Checkout with saved cards and refunds.
points.domains: Custom domains with automatic SSL are live; in-app domain registration & Zapier are coming soon.

payments.title: Payments & payouts
items: Card-on-file, Apple Pay, Google Pay supported
Stripe Radar, PCI DSS, SOC2 in progress

insight.subtitle: Get playbooks on staffing models, payroll compliance, and client retention while we ship new features.

cta.title: Run scheduling, payroll, and online sales from one login.
cta.description: Whether you manage a salon, fitness studio, recruiter network, or real estate team — Schedulaa connects bookings, sales, and payroll in one secure workspace.
